alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern West Feliciana, northwestern West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee, northern Iberville and west central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morganza, or near New Roads, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Roads, St. Francisville, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Morganza, Erwinville and Lottie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
